intro: Pachysanthus, commonly known as the Chinese sandalwood, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Olacaceae. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of Asia, particularly China, India, and Southeast Asia. Due to overharvesting and habitat loss, many species within this genus are now considered endangered.
